import React from 'react'; import Hero from './Hero.png'; import Mission from './Mission.png'; // Ensure this path is correct import './Page.css'; import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card'; import CardGroup from 'react-bootstrap/CardGroup'; import Values from './Values.png'; import Growth from './Growth.png'; function Page() { return (
{/* Hero Section with Image on the Left and Text on the Right */}

SafeMax Security

Protecting What Matters with Comprehensive VAPT Services and Strategic Cybersecurity.



{/*About us- Cards for Mission, Core Values, and Growth Story */}

Mission of SafeMax Security SafeMax Security is committed to providing cutting-edge cybersecurity solutions to protect businesses from emerging cyber threats. Through tailored Vulnerability Assessment & Penetration Testing (VAPT) services, we ensure the security of digital assets and sensitive data.

Core Values of SafeMax Security At SafeMax Security, we emphasize precision, proactive threat hunting, and a client-centric approach to deliver tailored solutions. We focus on innovation, integrating the latest technologies to strengthen defenses.

Growth Story Founded in 2020, SafeMax Security quickly became a leader in cybersecurity services, reaching a $75 million valuation by 2023. SafeMax aims to surpass a $200 million valuation by 2024. {/*Service Section*/ } Vulnerability Assessment & Penetration Testing (VAPT) Comprehensive scans and tests to identify system weaknesses.

Simulated cyber-attacks to assess security defenses.
); } export default Page;
